title: Hainan Changjiang Iron Tailings Comprehensive Utilization EPC Project
description: Located in Changjiang County, Hainan Province, this national key project processes 10,000 tons of iron tailings daily with original ore grade of 10-20 degrees. Zexin Mining Equipment provided comprehensive services from design to commissioning. The process includes primary crushing, secondary crushing, screening, and jigging, achieving efficient recovery of low-grade tailings.
challenge: The main challenges included difficulty in processing low-grade tailings with poor recovery rates using traditional methods. The limited site space required a highly optimized process layout. Strict local environmental requirements necessitated a balance between production efficiency and environmental protection.
solution: We implemented an innovative process route with an optimized crushing and screening system to improve material classification efficiency and multi-stage jigging process to increase iron mineral recovery. Our compact plant layout design enabled short-path material transfer. We installed high-efficiency dust removal and water treatment systems to meet environmental requirements, along with an intelligent control system for full-process automation.
results: The project achieved its expected goals with tailings comprehensive utilization rate increased by 25%. Annual iron concentrate production reached approximately 400,000 tons with grade improved to over 60%, meeting steel production requirements. Water recycling rate reached 95% with dust emissions below national standards. The project created significant economic benefits for the owner while reducing environmental pressure from tailings storage.
